about_the_game:
An Imp and an Impostor is an interactive urban fantasy novel by Athar Fikry, author of The Dragon and the Djinn.

You're an undercover imp, serving time for your magical misdeeds by working for Arkan, the division of the city government that investigates magical crimes. Your by-the-book partner doesn't know who you really are - or that your nose for crime is actually a nose for magic. Some of your magic was confiscated when you were sentenced, but you've got enough left to put you above most humans.

Now, just when you were about to recover the rest of your magic, it's gone missing from its vault! You need to track it down - and more importantly, track down the person who took it.

Go on daring heists, cracking open vaults using magic or gadgets. Talk your way past bureaucrats, professors, necromancers, mobsters, afreet, and djinn as you poke into all of the magical and mundane corners of the city, finding things that most people would like to keep hidden.

And pet the world's most adorable undead dog.
